extensionDescription.message: A simple browser extension for managing your productivity.

commandsStartTomato.description: Manifest.json command to start a new tomato timer.

commandsStartShortBreak.description: Manifest.json command to start a new short break.

commandsStartLongBreak.description: Manifest.json command to start a new long break.

commandsResetTimer.description: Manifest.json command to reset the current timer.
